item.description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to live in an architectural icon? Come to the screening of Koolhaas Houselife at 7:00 pm on Thursday, April 2 at the Seaport World Trade Center and experience the daily intimacy of a house in Bordeaux designed by Rem Koohaas. This charming and unique film has received limited North American distribution. Brian Healy AIA, moderator of the BSA's "Conversations on Architecture" program, hosts the screening which is only $25 ($10 for students). Learn more about the film (and see a trailer) at www.koolhaashouselife.com. Register for the film (session ST89) at www.rdcboston.com.

*Please note that you MUST register at www.rdcboston.com for this event, not just through Meetup! Thanks!*
item.name: Screening of Koolhaas Houselife
